MaxCyte 作为创始成员加入 mRNA 药物联盟 (AMM) MaxCyte, Inc. 是一家专注于细胞工程的领先公司，提供支持平台技术，以推进下一代细胞疗法和创新生物加工应用的发现、开发和商业化，今天宣布它已加入 mRNA 药物联盟 ( AMM），作为创始成员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/MaxCyte-Joins-the-Alliance-for-mRNA-Medicines-(AMM)-as-a-founding-member.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/MaxCyte-Joins-the-Alliance-for-mRNA-Medicines-(AMM)-as-a-founding-member.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f3ddc30-ce04-4cc7-adbd-5f136cbc81fa Thu, 16 Nov 2023 09:15:00 -0500 MaxCyte joins the Alliance for mRNA Medicines (AMM) as a founding member

新研究显示姜黄和心叶青牛胆可降低结核病患者的肝损伤风险草药和替代药物在预防抗结核药物引起的肝损伤方面的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/New-study-reveals-turmeric-and-Tinospora-Cordifolia-reduce-liver-injury-risk-in-TB-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/New-study-reveals-turmeric-and-Tinospora-Cordifolia-reduce-liver-injury-risk-in-TB-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=892d794c-6ac5-4081-b5f4-0606cc45cc2b Thu, 16 Nov 2023 08:26:00 -0500 New study reveals turmeric and Tinospora Cordifolia reduce liver injury risk in TB patients
新研究中罕见的 APOE3-R136S 突变可预防阿尔茨海默氏病病理R136S 基因突变可预防载脂蛋白 E4 (APOE4) 诱导的迟发性阿尔茨海默病 (LOAD)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Rare-APOE3-R136S-mutation-offers-protection-against-Alzheimers-disease-pathologies-in-new-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Rare-APOE3-R136S-mutation-offers-protection-against-Alzheimers-disease-pathologies-in-new-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1899c0e6-aa6d-4044-83ed-68222c5a6292 Thu, 16 Nov 2023 07:41:00 -0500 Rare APOE3-R136S mutation offers protection against Alzheimer's disease pathologies in new study
为儿童找到长期住院行为健康治疗变得越来越困难康妮·麦克唐纳 (Connie MacDonald) 在美国驻沙特阿拉伯吉达领事馆的国务院工作。这是一份梦想的工作，她喜欢和两个儿子一起住在国外。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Ite28099s-getting-harder-to-find-long-term-residential-behavioral-health-treatment-for-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Ite28099s-getting-harder-to-find-long-term-residential-behavioral-health-treatment-for-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21216193-35ed-49de-a072-a565562c4363 Thu, 16 Nov 2023 06:31:39 -0500 It’s getting harder to find long-term residential behavioral health treatment for kids
补偿是解决初级保健短缺问题的关键有钱能使鬼推磨。由于多种原因，美国面临着初级保健医生的严重短缺，但其中一个是不可避免的：补偿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Compensation-is-key-to-fixing-primary-care-shortage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Compensation-is-key-to-fixing-primary-care-shortage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=753a86a0-75ee-4817-bbed-8461250be84b Thu, 16 Nov 2023 06:30:12 -0500 Compensation is key to fixing primary care shortage
新的观察性研究显示，五分之一的尼尔马韦-利托那韦治疗患者出现病毒学反弹2019 年急性冠状病毒病患者中病毒反弹 (VR) 的频率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/One-in- Five-病人-on-Nirmatrelvire28093Ritonavir-experience-virologic-rebound-new-observational-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/One-in- Five-病人-on-Nirmatrelvire28093Ritonavir-experience-virologic-rebound-new-observational-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2eba75c-e2a1-4d23-bd9e-eac82272425c Thu, 16 Nov 2023 06:25:00 -0500 One in five patients on Nirmatrelvir–Ritonavir experience virologic rebound, new observational study reveals
研究表明针灸和按摩是治疗晚期癌症的有效疼痛方法在一项临床试验中，针灸和按摩疗法显着减轻了疼痛、疲劳和失眠，提高了晚期癌症患者 26 周的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Study-reveals-acupuncture-and-massage-as- effective-pain-management-in-advanced-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Study-reveals-acupuncture-and-massage-as- effective-pain-management-in-advanced-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3bc7f156-31c9-4193-aca0-21884b8482bc Thu, 16 Nov 2023 00:33:00 -0500 Study reveals acupuncture and massage as effective pain management in advanced cancer
姜黄素促进 HIV 药物的大脑输送，抑制炎症和氧化应激研究表明，姜黄素可以增强抗逆转录病毒的传递，减少艾滋病毒的炎症和氧化应激，从而为治疗艾滋病毒相关的神经认知障碍提供潜在的改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Curcumin-boosts-brain-delivery-of-HIV-drug-curbing-inflammation-and-oxygen-stress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Curcumin-boosts-brain-delivery-of-HIV-drug-curbing-inflammation-and-oxygen-stress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e308e78a-f4bb-4c72-acb9-9cee09016df3 Thu, 16 Nov 2023 00:16:00 -0500 Curcumin boosts brain delivery of HIV drug, curbing inflammation and oxidative stress
